fitness.CarouselTitle1: The Best Prices for Your Goals
fitness.CarouselText1: Find the best deals tailored to your needs.
fitness.line1: State-of-the-art equipment for all fitness levels.
fitness.line2: Expert trainers to guide you every step of the way.
fitness.line3: Flexible workout schedules that fit your life.
fitness.line4: A supportive community to keep you motivated.
fitness.line5: Programs tailored to your specific goals.

section1.title: A fitness center where you can train without the crowd, delays, or distractions.
section1.text: Tired of overcrowded gyms where effective training feels impossible?Frustrated with waiting for equipment while someone types out a text? Searching for a space where you can train without interruptions? Look no further—MAXXGYM is exactly what you need. We offer a focused environment designed for people like you, enabling effective workouts free from distractions.
section1.text2: For over 20 years, we’ve helped thousands of clients achieve incredible results with a different approach—creating a welcoming atmosphere, offering diverse equipment, and fostering great company. No awkward stares, no texting on machines, just top-quality training. We’ve built this space over two decades for our clients and their success.

section2.title: The environment you train in has a massive impact on your results.
section2.text: Unfortunately, over 72% of gym-goers don’t complete their planned workouts due to time constraints—mostly caused by waiting for busy equipment. But it doesn’t have to be this way!
section2.text2: We’ve created the perfect alternative by moving to a new, larger location equipped with a wide variety of machines and tools at MAXXGYM. Our unique approach attracts a different kind of audience, ensuring no unnecessary waiting for equipment and making your workouts more time-efficient.Book your free visit today and see the difference for yourself!

section3.title: Over 30 years of fitness expertise reflected in our professionalism and your success.
section3.text: Why waste time experimenting with unproven training methods and questionable diet strategies?
section3.text2: The MAXXGYM team is here to support you in an exclusive group, answering your questions about exercises, gym usage, and the basics of health-friendly nutrition. This guidance saves you time and enhances your fitness knowledge, providing a shortcut to achieving your fitness goals more efficiently.

down.heroTitle: Over 30 years of fitness expertise, reflected in our professionalism and unwavering support for your journey.
down.heroText: Why waste time experimenting with unproven training methods and questionable dietary strategies?
down.heroText2: The MAXXGYM team is here to help you achieve faster results through a dedicated support group. We’ll answer your questions about exercises, gym usage, and the basics of health-friendly nutrition. This will save you valuable time and deepen your understanding of fitness training. It's your shortcut to reaching your fitness goals with ease.

leftPhoto.heroTitle: Save yourself the hassle of searching for your beginner workout plan and try the MAXX Training START-UP program.
leftPhoto.heroText: Why waste time searching for the best workout plan, figuring out the correct exercise techniques, or learning how to use equipment properly? Save that time and focus on what matters most to you while we take care of your beginner training program.
leftPhoto.heroText2: Clients visiting MAXXGYM for the first time receive a special gift from us:
leftPhoto.bulletText1: A FREE introductory personal training session.
leftPhoto.bulletText3: and a FREE protein shake after your introductory training session, on us.
leftPhoto.heroText3: All to ensure your fitness journey starts at its MAXXimum.

form.title: Reserve Your Free Ticket
form.description: Avoid common fitness mistakes with our help and try us 100% FREE. Fill out the form below to get your free ticket and visit us as soon as possible.

1.title: Still not convinced?
1.text: Best fitness in Ljubljana. Very professional and approachable staff. The owner helps everyone in the gym no matter who you are!
1.author: Klemen Tušek

2.title: The best gym!
2.text: All equipment is always available, clean space, and great atmosphere.
2.author: Ana Novak

3.title: Amazing results!
3.text: In just 3 months, I achieved goals I had dreamed of for years!
3.author: Marko Kovač

4.title: Professional staff!
4.text: The trainers are very friendly and always ready to help.
4.author: Eva Petek

5.title: Highly recommend!
5.text: The best investment I have made for myself!
5.author: Miha Zupan

6.title: Always motivated!
6.text: Training at MaxxGym has become my routine because of the excellent atmosphere.
6.author: Tina Jernej
